member.name: IMFByteStreamCacheControl.StopBackgroundTransfer
member.summary: Stops the background transfer of data to the local cache.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Controls how a network byte stream transfers data to a local cache. Optionally, this interface is exposed by byte streams that read data from a network, for example, through HTTP.
To get a pointer to this interface, call QueryInterface on the byte stream object.
